key.name: compatible-projects
key.summary: A list of compatible projects
key.description: This is a list of compatible projects we should show such as GNOME, KDE and XFCE.

key.name: allow-updates
key.summary: Whether to manage updates and upgrades in GNOME Software
key.description: If disabled, GNOME Software will hide the updates panel, not perform any automatic updates actions or prompt for upgrades.

key.name: download-updates
key.summary: Automatically download and install updates
key.description: If enabled, GNOME Software automatically downloads software updates in the background, also installing ones that do not require a reboot.

key.name: download-updates-notify
key.summary: Notify the user about software updated in the background
key.description: If enabled, GNOME Software notifies the user about updates that happened whilst the user was idle.

key.name: refresh-when-metered
key.summary: Whether to automatically refresh when on a metered connection
key.description: If enabled, GNOME Software automatically refreshes in the background even when using a metered connection (eventually downloading some metadata, checking for updates, etc., which may incur in costs for the user).

key.name: first-run
key.summary: Whether it’s the very first run of GNOME Software

key.name: show-ratings
key.summary: Show star ratings next to applications

key.name: filter-default-branch
key.summary: Filter applications based on the default branch set for the remote

key.name: prompt-for-nonfree
key.summary: Non-free applications show a warning dialog before install
key.description: When non-free applications are installed a warning dialog can be shown. This controls if that dialog is suppressed.

key.name: popular-overrides
key.summary: A list of popular applications
key.description: A list of applications to use, overriding the system defined ones.

key.name: check-timestamp
key.summary: The last update check timestamp

key.name: upgrade-notification-timestamp
key.summary: The last upgrade notification timestamp

key.name: security-timestamp
key.summary: The timestamp of the first security update, cleared after update

key.name: install-timestamp
key.summary: The last update timestamp

key.name: screenshot-cache-age-maximum
key.summary: The age in seconds to verify the upstream screenshot is still valid
key.description: Choosing a larger value will mean less round-trips to the remote server but updates to the screenshots may take longer to show to the user. A value of 0 means to never check the server if the image already exists in the cache.

key.name: review-server
key.summary: The server to use for application reviews

key.name: review-karma-required
key.summary: The minimum karma score for reviews
key.description: Reviews with karma less than this number will not be shown.

key.name: official-repos
key.summary: A list of official repositories that should not be considered 3rd party

key.name: free-repos
key.summary: A list of official repositories that should be considered free software

key.name: free-repos-url
key.summary: The licence URL to use when an application should be considered free software

key.name: install-bundles-system-wide
key.summary: Install bundled applications for all users on the system where possible

key.name: show-folder-management
key.summary: Show the folder management UI

key.name: enable-repos-dialog
key.summary: Allow access to the Software Repositories dialog

key.name: show-upgrade-prerelease
key.summary: Offer upgrades for pre-releases

key.name: show-nonfree-ui
key.summary: Show some UI elements informing the user that an app is non-free

key.name: show-nonfree-prompt
key.summary: Show the prompt to install nonfree software repositories

key.name: installed-page-show-size
key.summary: Show the installed size for apps in the list of installed applications

key.name: nonfree-software-uri
key.summary: The URI that explains nonfree and proprietary software

key.name: external-appstream-urls
key.summary: A list of URLs pointing to appstream files that will be downloaded into an app-info folder

key.name: external-appstream-system-wide
key.summary: Install the AppStream files to a system-wide location for all users

key.name: enable-shell-extensions-repo
key.summary: Enable GNOME Shell extensions repository
